group_1.narration: I ran into Mito, and we went shopping@together. But then on the way back...

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad I could buy it today.
This is the motivation I need to finish my@homework!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Wooo! I'm lookin' forward to eating the@sweets you make!

group_1.textLeft: Great, then let's bake something at my@house this Sunday!
Huh? What is it?
Oh, the poster about the suspicious guy.@They even have it here?
(I know they're just warning us to be@careful, but...)
(Seeing this stuff every day is really@putting me on edge.)

group_1.textRight: No, not the poster! Under it!

group_1.textLeft: Underneath? Where all the shrubs are@growing?
[chara:301301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh! You mean that!

group_1.narration: When we were small, we'd put the acorns@we gathered into a box and buried it, like it@was our "savings". We called it our@acorn bank. We went to all the trees in the@neighborhood collecting them!

group_1.textLeft: My eyes went straight to the poster, but@yeah, you're right.

group_1.textRight: I used to check up on it a lot! I wanted to@make sure it hadn't been dug up!

group_1.textLeft: Ah ha ha! You did a great job protecting@them!
This takes me back.
(Another great memory I made here...)
(But it's right under that poster warning us@about suspicious activity.)
We should do it again sometime.
Huh?
Who's that walking around over there?@Is that Seika?

group_1.textRight: Oooh, yeah, that does look like her.
But it's hard to tell from here, isn't it?
Ah, she went around the corner.

group_1.textLeft: Was it really her?

group_1.textRight: She told us she had stuff to do, so maybe@that's what she was doing.

group_1.textLeft: She had something to do in the Central@Shopping Village?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, she was comin' from that way.

group_1.textLeft: I wonder what she needed to do there.

group_1.narration: Right then, I started to get a bad feeling.
And then the next day, that@bad feeling quickly got worse.
We heard some news.@The suspicious man had been found@and was being kept in custody.
